short_summary: Procurement for dental equipment and supplies to be delivered to a clinic in London, UK.
description: Detailed description of the procurement process and the requirements for the delivery of various pieces of dental equipment and cabinetry.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Dental Equipment, Cabinetry, Installation, and Training 

**Tender Number: W6369-24-A052**
___________________________________________________________________________

**Publication Date:** November 20, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** January 2, 2025, 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

This tender is open to any qualified supplier and is issued in accordance with the Government of Canada's procurement guidelines. 

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking bids for the supply, installation, and training of dental equipment and cabinetry for a new clinic located in London, United Kingdom. 

**Scope of Work:**

* Supply of various dental equipment and cabinetry
* Installation, integration, and configuration of the equipment within 10 calendar days of delivery
* Provision of hands-on training on the use and care of the equipment once installed

**Contract Period:** The contract period will run from the date of contract award to 1 year thereafter.

**_requirements for Delivery:_

* The contractor must deliver the dental equipment and cabinetry within 100 calendar days from contract award
* All goods must be delivered to the specified location in London, United Kingdom
* The contractor must provide all necessary documentation and certification for the equipment installed.

**Pricing Method:**

* Bids will be evaluated based on lowest price

**Trade Agreements:**

* The contract may be subject to one or more of the following trade agreements:
    Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
    World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
The tender is open to suppliers from around the world.

**Regulations:**
Please refer to the attached tender documents for a comprehensive overview of the requirements and regulations.

**Contact Information:**

* Karin Donis, carb package Manager
* Email: karin.donis@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 576-3085

**Access to Tender Documents:**

* English version: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52298/w6369-24-a052---rfp---english-version.pdf>
* French version: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52298/w6369-24-a052---rfp---french
